creditline: Gift of Richard and Linda Parins
description: Snowy paved square with long line of people entering a small building in midground; large building with people in front at right
markings: \'DBAL0268\', in pencil, lower left corner, on back; untranslated stamp, in Russian, at lower right corner, on back; \'PRINTED UNDER THE SUPERVISION OF/TATIANA BALTERMANTS/FROM a NEGATIVE BY/DMITRII BALTERMANTS/THIS IS PRINT NO.22/25 [illegible signature]/[copyright sign] ESTATE OF DMITRII BALTERMANTS\', on stamp, at lower right corner, on back
title: Queue for Lenin's Tomb
